metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1283 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: NULL Pointer Dereference in r_bin_ne_get_entrypoints function in GitHubrepository radareorg/radare2 prior to 5.6.8. This vulnerability allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (application crash).

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
